name: bWave Touch Slider Gallery with Bootstrap for Elementor
author: Erwan Pianezza

sections.description:
this touch enabled image Gallery module takes the best of bootstrap, Jquery, to allow photographers, designers, artists to display images in a nice responsive touch-enabled popin slider within Elementor layout.

It simply displays one full size image, with minimalist purpose : click to view other images

Requirements

  • Active plugins :
    Elementor, the best and world leading page builder for wordpress
    Wp Bootstrap Gallery, designed by magnigenie, India, based on blueimp boostrap gallery

  • Dependencies :

Bootstrap3 is included in WP Boostrap Gallery. Future versions will allow to include (or not include the WP Boostrap Gallery bootstrap distribution)
Currently tested with
Wp Bootstrap Theme from After Image Design
TwentyNineteen

  • Available Options

randomize gallery : get a random image !!
sections.installation:
1. install elementor, wpboostrap gallery,
  2. create elementor page or edit existing elementor page
  3. create your first gallery within elementor layout, upload images, preview
sections.faq:
My theme already has boostrap : can I remove the bootstrap from Wp Bootstrap Gallery

Currently I do not recommend removing bootstrap from the Wp Bootstrap Gallery – unless you know what you’re doing. Code optimisation is on the way
